name: Maududi
text: By those who range themselves in rows;

name: Maududi
text: by those who reprove severely,

name: Maududi
text: and those who recite the Exhortation;

name: Maududi
text: surely your God is One,

name: Maududi
text: the Lord of the heavens and the earth and of whatever lies between the two, the Lord of the Easts.

name: Maududi
text: We have adorned the lower heaven with the adornment of the stars

name: Maududi
text: and have protected it from every rebellious satan.

name: Maududi
text: These satans cannot listen to what transpires in the High Council for they are pelted away from every side

name: Maududi
text: and are repelled. Theirs is an unceasing chastisement.

name: Maududi
text: And if any is able to snatch a fragment, he is pursued by a piercing flame.

name: Maududi
text: So ask them (that is, human beings): “Were they harder to create than the objects We created?” We created them from sticky clay.

name: Maududi
text: You marvel (at the wondrous creations of Allah) and they scoff at it,

name: Maududi
text: and when they are admonished, they pay no heed;

name: Maududi
text: and if they see any Sign, they laugh it away

name: Maududi
text: and say: “This is nothing but plain sorcery.

name: Maududi
text: Is it ever possible that after we die and are reduced to dust and (a skeleton of) bones, we will be raised to life?

name: Maududi
text: And so also shall our forefathers of yore be raised to life?”

name: Maududi
text: Tell them: “Yes; and you are utterly helpless (against Allah).”

name: Maududi
text: There will be a single stern rebuff and lo, they will be observing with their own eyes (all that they had been warned against).

name: Maududi
text: They will then say: “Woe for us. This is the Day of Judgement.”

name: Maududi
text: “Yes, this is the Day of Final Decision that you used to deny as a lie.”

name: Maududi
text: (Then will the command be given): “Muster all the wrong-doers and their spouses and the deities whom they used to serve

name: Maududi
text: apart from Allah, and direct them to the path of Hell,

name: Maududi
text: and detain them there; they will be called to account.

name: Maududi
text: How is it that you are not helping one another?

name: Maududi
text: Indeed, today they are surrendering themselves completely.”

name: Maududi
text: They will then turn towards each other (and start wrangling).

name: Maududi
text: (The followers will say to their leaders): “You used to come to us from the right hand.”

name: Maududi
text: They will say: “Nay, you yourselves were not the ones who would believe.

name: Maududi
text: We had no power over you. You were a rebellious people,

name: Maududi
text: and so we became deserving of the Word of our Lord that we shall be made to suffer chastisement.

name: Maududi
text: So we led you astray; we ourselves were strayed.”

name: Maududi
text: On that Day, they will all share the chastisement.

name: Maududi
text: Thus do We treat the culprits.

name: Maududi
text: Whenever it was said to them: “There is no true deity apart from Allah,” they waxed proud

name: Maududi
text: and said: “Shall we forsake our deities for the sake of a distracted poet?”

name: Maududi
text: (They say so although) he brought the Truth and confirmed the veracity of the Messengers.

name: Maududi
text: (They will be told): “You shall taste the grievous chastisement.

name: Maududi
text: You will only be recompensed according to your deeds.”

name: Maududi
text: But Allah's chosen servants (shall be spared this woeful end).

name: Maududi
text: For them awaits a known provision,

name: Maududi
text: a variety of delicious fruits; and they shall be honoured

name: Maududi
text: in the Gardens of Bliss.

name: Maududi
text: They will be seated upon couches set face to face;

name: Maududi
text: a cup filled with wine from its springs, will be passed around to them;

name: Maududi
text: white, sparkling (wine), a delight to the drinkers.

name: Maududi
text: There will neither be any harm in it for their body nor will it intoxicate their mind.

name: Maududi
text: Theirs shall be wide-eyed maidens with bashful, restrained glances,

name: Maududi
text: so delicate as the hidden peel under an egg's shell.

name: Maududi
text: Then some of them will turn to others, and will ask each other.

name: Maududi
text: One of them will say: “I had a companion in the world

name: Maududi
text: who used to say: -- Are you also one of those who confirm the Truth (of life after death)?

name: Maududi
text: After we are dead and have become all dust and bones shall we still be requited?'

name: Maududi
text: He will say: -- Do you wish to know where he is now?'

name: Maududi
text: Then he will look downwards, and will see him in the depths of Hell.

name: Maududi
text: He will say to him: -- By Allah, you almost ruined me.

name: Maududi
text: But for Allah's favour, I should be one of those who have been mustered here.

name: Maududi
text: So, are we not going to die,

name: Maududi
text: except for our first death? And shall we suffer no chastisement?'”

name: Maududi
text: Surely this is the supreme triumph.

name: Maududi
text: For the like of it should the workers work.

name: Maududi
text: Is this a better hospitality or the tree of al-Zaqqum?

name: Maududi
text: We have made this tree a trial for the wrong-doers.

name: Maududi
text: It is a tree that grows in the nethermost part of Hell.

name: Maududi
text: Its spathes are like the heads of satans.

name: Maududi
text: (The people of Hell) will surely eat of it, filling their bellies with it.

name: Maududi
text: Then on top of it they will have a brew of boiling water.

name: Maududi
text: Then their return will be to the same blazing Hell.

name: Maududi
text: These are the ones who found their fathers steeped in error,

name: Maududi
text: and they are running in their footsteps.

name: Maududi
text: Before them a multitude of people of olden times had erred,

name: Maududi
text: and We had sent among them Messengers to warn them.

name: Maududi
text: Observe, then, what was the end of those that had been warned,

name: Maududi
text: except for the chosen servants of Allah?

name: Maududi
text: Noah had called upon Us (earlier). See, how excellent We were in answering him!

name: Maududi
text: We delivered him and his household from the great calamity;

name: Maududi
text: and made his offspring the only ones to survive,

name: Maududi
text: and We established for him a good name among posterity.

name: Maududi
text: Peace be upon Noah among all the nations.

name: Maududi
text: Thus do We reward all those who do good.

name: Maududi
text: Surely he was one of Our truly believing servants.

name: Maududi
text: Thereafter We caused the others to be drowned.

name: Maududi
text: Abraham was on the self-same way (as Noah).

name: Maududi
text: When he came to his Lord with a pure heart,

name: Maududi
text: and said to his father and his people: “Whom do you worship?

name: Maududi
text: Is it false deities that you want to serve rather than Allah?

name: Maududi
text: What do you think of the Lord of the whole Universe?”

name: Maududi
text: Then he looked carefully at the stars

name: Maududi
text: and said: “I am sick.”

name: Maududi
text: So turning their backs, they went away from him.

name: Maududi
text: Then he went quietly to the (temple of the deities) and said: “What is the matter with you, why do you not eat?

name: Maududi
text: What is the matter with you, why do you not speak?”

name: Maududi
text: Then he turned upon them, striking them with his right hand,

name: Maududi
text: whereupon people came to him running.

name: Maududi
text: Abraham said to them: “Do you worship what you yourselves have carved with your own hands

name: Maududi
text: while it is Allah Who has created you and all that you make?”

name: Maududi
text: They spoke among themselves: “Build him a pyre and then throw him into the furnace.”

name: Maududi
text: They had contrived an evil plan against him, but We abased them all.

name: Maududi
text: Abraham said: “I am going to my Lord; He will guide me.

name: Maududi
text: Lord, grant me a righteous son.”

name: Maududi
text: (In response to this prayer) We gave him the good news of a prudent boy;

name: Maududi
text: and when he was old enough to go about and work with him, (one day) Abraham said to him: “My son, I see in my dream that I am slaughtering you. So consider (and tell me) what you think.” He said: “Do as you are bidden. You will find me, if Allah so wills, among the steadfast.”

name: Maududi
text: When both surrendered (to Allah's command) and Abraham flung the son down on his forehead,

name: Maududi
text: We cried out: “O Abraham,

name: Maududi
text: you have indeed fulfilled your dream. Thus do We reward the good-doers.”

name: Maududi
text: This was indeed a plain trial.

name: Maududi
text: And We ransomed him with a mighty sacrifice,

name: Maududi
text: and We preserved for him a good name among posterity.

name: Maududi
text: Peace be upon Abraham.

name: Maududi
text: Thus do We reward the good-doers.

name: Maududi
text: Surely he was one of Our believing servants.

name: Maududi
text: And We gave him the good news of Isaac, a Prophet and among the righteous ones.

name: Maududi
text: And We blessed him and Isaac. Among the offspring of the two some did good and some plainly wronged themselves.

name: Maududi
text: Verily We bestowed Our favours on Moses and Aaron

name: Maududi
text: and We delivered both of them and their people from the great calamity.

name: Maududi
text: We succoured them, and they gained the upper hand (against their enemies).

name: Maududi
text: We granted them a Clear Book,

name: Maududi
text: and showed them the Straight Way,

name: Maududi
text: and preserved for them a good name among posterity.

name: Maududi
text: Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.

name: Maududi
text: Thus do We reward the good-doers.

name: Maududi
text: Surely both of them were among Our believing servants.

name: Maududi
text: Surely, Elias too was among the Messengers.

name: Maududi
text: (Call to mind) when he said to his people: “Will you not fear Allah?

name: Maududi
text: Do you call upon Baal and forsake the Best of the Creators?

name: Maududi
text: Allah is your Lord and the Lord of your ancestors of yore.”

name: Maududi
text: But they denounced him as a liar, so they will surely be arraigned (for punishment),

name: Maududi
text: except Allah's chosen servants.

name: Maududi
text: We preserved a good name for him among posterity.

name: Maududi
text: Peace be upon Elias.

name: Maududi
text: Thus do We reward the good-doers.

name: Maududi
text: He was one of Our believing servants.

name: Maududi
text: And Lot too was one of the Messengers.

name: Maududi
text: (Call to mind) when We delivered him and all his kinsfolk,

name: Maududi
text: except for an old woman who was among those that stayed behind.

name: Maududi
text: Then We utterly destroyed the rest of them.

name: Maududi
text: You pass by their desolate habitations in the morning

name: Maududi
text: and at night. Do you still not understand?

name: Maududi
text: And Jonah too was one of the Messengers.

name: Maududi
text: Call to mind when he fled to the laden ship,

name: Maududi
text: cast lots, and was among the losers.

name: Maududi
text: Then a fish swallowed him, and he was blameworthy.

name: Maududi
text: Had he not been one of those who glorify Allah,

name: Maududi
text: he would certainly have remained in its belly till the Day of Resurrection.

name: Maududi
text: But We threw him on a wide bare tract of land while he was ill;

name: Maududi
text: and caused a gourd tree to grow over him,

name: Maududi
text: and We sent him forth to a nation of a hundred thousand or more,

name: Maududi
text: and they believed. So We let them enjoy life for a while.

name: Maududi
text: So ask their opinion: “(Are you convinced) that your Lord should have daughters and you should have sons?

name: Maududi
text: Did We create the angels as females the while they witnessed?”

name: Maududi
text: Behold, it is one of their fabrications that they say:

name: Maududi
text: “Allah has begotten.” They are liars!

name: Maududi
text: Did He choose daughters rather than sons?

name: Maududi
text: What is the matter with you that you make such strange judgements?

name: Maududi
text: Will you then not take heed?

name: Maududi
text: Do you have any clear authority for such claims?

name: Maududi
text: Bring your Book, if you are truthful.

name: Maududi
text: They have established a kinship between Allah and the angels; and the angels know well that these people will be arraigned (as culprits).

name: Maududi
text: (They say): “Exalted be Allah above what they attribute to Him,

name: Maududi
text: all of them except the chosen servants of Allah.

name: Maududi
text: So you and your deities

name: Maududi
text: shall not be able to tempt anyone away from Allah

name: Maududi
text: except him who shall roast in the Blazing Fire.

name: Maududi
text: As for us, there is none but has an appointed station.

name: Maududi
text: Verily we range ourselves in rows (as humble servants)

name: Maududi
text: and we are of those who glorify Allah.”

name: Maududi
text: They used to say before:

name: Maududi
text: “If only we had the Reminder which had been granted to the people of yore

name: Maududi
text: we would surely have been Allah's chosen servants.”

name: Maududi
text: But when it came to them, they rejected it. They shall soon come to know (the end of such an attitude).

name: Maududi
text: We have already given Our promise to Our Messengers

name: Maududi
text: that they shall certainly be succoured,

name: Maududi
text: and that Our hosts shall triumph.

name: Maududi
text: So, (O Prophet), leave them alone for a while,

name: Maududi
text: and see, and soon they too shall see.

name: Maududi
text: Do they seek to hasten Our chastisement?

name: Maududi
text: When that chastisement will descend upon their courtyard, evil shall that Day be for those who had been warned.

name: Maududi
text: Leave them alone for a while,

name: Maududi
text: and see; and they too shall soon see.

name: Maududi
text: Exalted be your Lord, the Lord of Glory, above what they attribute to Him,

name: Maududi
text: and peace be upon the Messengers,

name: Maududi
text: and all praise be to Allah, the Lord of the Universe.
